dataStructure.name: sid.org.tmforum.tip.cbe.root.ch.CharacteristicValue
dataStructure.description:
A value of a CharacteristicSpecifcation chosen or entered (if no values are specified) for a Entity that further defines what the Entity is.

This entity is optional
dataStructure.label: CharacteristicValue

child.name: value
child.description:
A fact that describes a Entity.

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: value

child.name: validFor
child.description:

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
